categories: Category:Admirals and generals of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: General Threnoldt was a Human male Commanding officer of the Imperial Reclamation Service during the Galactic War. Stationed above the Harrower-class dreadnought Ziost Shadow after a bomb attack on the Eternity Vault, Threnoldt recruited a team of the Empire's best heroes to investigate the vault on the planet Belsavis and to put an end to The Infernal One.

If the player is a Sith Inquisitor while conversing with Threnoldt, he will state that he knew Darth Thanaton well and felt that he should inform his successor. In turn, the player can mention having Lieutenant Talos Drellik in their service.
